channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Trial on new Georgia election certification rules set to begin
item.description: A trial is set to get underway on a lawsuit filed by Democrats challenging two new rules passed by the Georgia State Election Board that have to do with county certification of election results.

item.title: A Texas man is set to be executed for fatally stabbing twin teenage girls in 1989
item.description: A Texas man convicted of fatally stabbing twin 16-year-old girls decades ago is facing execution. Garcia White is scheduled to receive a lethal injection Tuesday evening at the state penitentiary in Huntsville.

item.title: Closing arguments expected in trial of 3 former Memphis officers charged in Tyre Nicholsâ€™ death
item.description: Closing arguments are expected in the federal trial of three former Memphis police officers charged in the 2023 fatal beating of Tyre Nichol.
